headline: Assessing M&T Bank (MTB) Valuation After Recent Share Price Fluctuations
summary: M&T Bank (MTB) shares have seen gentle ups and downs over the past month, as investors continue to assess the company’s longer-term performance. The stock’s year-to-date return is slightly negative, but its five-year total return remains strong. See our latest analysis for M&T Bank. M&T Bank’s share price has slipped 8.6% over the past month, with some choppiness following a period of steadier growth. Despite this short-term dip, long-term investors have still enjoyed a total shareholder...
